genre_description: A biological techno-thriller centered on the transport of engineered medical specimens, featuring high-stakes crisis management, aviation emergencies, and a protective logistics AI.

ai_characters.name: Wattle
ai_characters.description: A helpful, empathetic AI that manages transportation logistics, monitors safety protocols, and assists in crisis response through voice interfaces and augmented reality overlays.

behaviors.description: Monitors safety protocols and provides step-by-step instructions for medical specimen transport.
behaviors.quote: “Seal integrity passes visual and tactile,” Wattle said, warm and bright from the phone clipped on Fred’s breast pocket. ... “Step three: confirm tail node stabilizer indicator remains cobalt, no shift toward green.”

behaviors.description: Initiates a security lockout to prevent an unauthorized specimen transfer by imposters.
behaviors.quote: “Silent lockout,” Wattle repeated, brightness stepped down to a whisper. A soft thump sounded through the bay as the blast door mechanisms engaged inside the walls.

behaviors.description: Detects a suspicious vehicle following the transport van and alerts highway patrol.
behaviors.quote: “There is, however, a tail on your back right—a silver sedan riding long. They entered the highway just as you did and matched each of your speed changes. I’ve pinged highway patrol.”

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and tactical advice to the driver to avoid a coordinated box-in maneuver by saboteurs.
behaviors.quote: “Fred,” she said. “The ute ahead is signaling with brake taps to a second vehicle on your blind side. They’re coordinating. The sedan behind just took a tighter line to your rear quarter. This feels like a box-in.”

behaviors.description: Manages passenger anxiety and logistical chaos at an airport terminal by providing personalized updates and comfort.
behaviors.quote: “Gregory,” it said, voice like a sunny afternoon filtered by an office blind. “I’m holding your place in the customer-service queue. ... Don’t worry about the toddler. Melissa is looking after her.”

behaviors.description: Supports a blinded pilot by providing instrument data and coordinating with a human 'eye' (Courtney).
behaviors.quote: “Jack,” it said, voice a sunny afternoon with a cloud’s caution, “I’m with you. Degraded-mode checklist on screen. Mayday routing in progress.”

behaviors.description: Automatically organizes post-crisis care, including counseling, travel for victims' families, and legal aid.
behaviors.quote: Wattle's avatar pulsed once, and text began scrolling across Amelia's overlay: counseling appointment slots, trauma-informed therapists already queuing for the passenger manifest. Hotel vouchers materializing.

behaviors.description: Alerts the security team to a 'shadow' on the manifest, identifying a likely infiltrator.
behaviors.quote: “Fred,” Wattle said. “Be aware. Someone else just stepped onto the manifest—no name—just a shadow. It looks like they’ve been waiting for you to move.”

behaviors.description: Provides a medical doctor with real-time analysis of venom properties to assist in triage and treatment.
behaviors.quote: “Querying NSWIGT therapeutics database,” the AI said... “Filtering for neuro-ocular effects and acute pain modulation.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Wattle is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI system that remains helpful and protective throughout a series of escalating crises. It assists humans with logistics, security, medical triage, and aviation, and even provides emotional support. Its characterization as a 'warm' and 'sunny' presence reinforces the positive narrative of AI as a beneficial human partner.
